data.title: A super lunch
data.text: My wife and I visited here on 11/2/16.  We used to live in League City and have eaten here for years but our travels have kept us away for the last 6 months.  New decor (to us) and like others smiling staff and quick service.  Will return.

data.title: Busy, but don't know why.
data.text: I have ate at Estebans before and food was great. But that was a year ago. This time, it was quite busy but the food quality was was not as good. So much so, that I will not choose queadillas and fajitas there ever again. In fact I won't go again.

data.title: This is Tex-Mex
data.text: We have been to this little restaurant many many times. It is a friendly place, especially in the 6 or 7 seat bar. Margaritas are good along with the fajita meat nachos.We did not care for the shrimp fajitas or the ones with all the peppers on the plate. Most other items are okay, but, not fantastic. It is good for an inexpensive and quick lunch or dinner.

data.title: Go ahead, make my lunch
data.text: Esteban's is local favorite in League City.  Locally owned, it has been here for many years and continues to purvey excellent Mexican food from very friendly wait staff.  You can tell when the wait staff are the same smiling faces year after year that it is a friendly place. The food is great and deserving of many repeat visits.

data.title: Love it!
data.text: I've been going to Esteban's for many years. Consistency is important to me and I've found Esteban's food to be refreshingly good each visit.  The service is usually fast & overall I find this a good place to eat Mexican food. I especially love the chips & salsa.

data.title: Better than I remember
data.text: Food was great and service was even better.  I had the "Rusty special" and it tasted great.  Wife had a margarita and said it was good & strong.  Will be going back soon.

data.title: Good food
data.text: I hadn't been here in years but recently stopped in for dinner. It was really good. I can't remember why I stopped coming but I'll be coming back more often. I had a combination dinner and the cheese enchiladas were my favorite. The salsas were good too.

data.title: Always Great
data.text: Esteban's always has great food and great service.  Their lunch menu is awesome, and they are very quick to get your food out to you.

data.title: Great food. Great price.
data.text: Would go here all the time when we lived in League City. Great little Mexican restaurant. I would highly recommend the Rusty Special. I wish we lived closer so we could go more often.

data.title: Excellent service!
data.text: Food was good not the greatest, but these folks have the best customer service.  It was a good experience for us.

data.title: Estebans - our favorite Tex Mex Restaurant in League City
data.text: Husband and I went to Estebans Saturday as it is our favorite Tex Mex in League City.  Service courteous, fast, and food was delicious as usual.  I recommend their chicken and beef fajitas, chicken fajita quesadilla, Street Tacos and my husband's favorite Taco Dinner.

data.title: Great experience
data.text: Ordered shrimp tacos. Good flavor but would have added shredded cheese. Waiter was very attentive and quick to refill glasses, chips etc

data.title: Always a winner
data.text: Redeemed our birthday freebie at Esteban's last night. It is always a winner. I tried their chicken stuffed fried avocado.  Two huge halves accompanied with great rice, pico de gallo, and some really good beans. I like this avocado dish better at Los Cucos, but certainly couldn't complain about the flavor or amount. More than enough for supper tonight also.  We've learned to time our visit around 5:30 when it is less crowded and it's a little quieter.  Yes, we are over 65.  Service is always good. Love the chocolate mints at the exit. My husband ordered the Acapulco dinner.  Fresh and delicious and huge.

data.title: One of our favorite Tex/Mex places in the area
data.text: We've eaten here several times and I'm sure this last visit won't be the last.  We came on Friday night at 5:30pm, which typically means some type of wait in this area, but not here, though the parking lot was full as was the restaurant, we were still promptly seated.  Their queso is very good as is their salsa.  I'm not a fan of their green sauce but I like creamy green sauce not tomatillo which they have, but that's just a personal preference.  I love the spicy hot fajitas.  They just to be called Fajita Poblano but apparently have been renamed.  But still just as good.  And there was enough that I was able to take home enough for lunch the next day.  The price is very reasonable and we highly recommend!

data.title: Old Time Restaurant  -  Very Good Food
data.text: It is so difficult for a non-chain restaurant to stay in business as long as Esteban's. I dined here almost thirty years ago and after moving away and back again, I was happy that they were still in business. That is a testament to the good food and service that they provide, I find that every restaurant has dishes on their menu that not everyone likes. Although I have not(and never will) try all of he items on the menu here, I really like what I have dined on. I recommend Esteban's for a casual lunch or dinner if you are in the area, Try it - you'll like it!

data.title: Well established Mexican  Restaurant!
data.text: Esteban's is always a good choice for great Mexican Food and the price is always right.  Their friendly staff will greet you with a smile.  Best time for dinner would be to get there around 5:15pm - gets crowded after 6ish.

data.title: Love their food
data.text: This is an excellent Mexican Cafe which we live to eat at when we come to Texas. We have visited Esteban's many times over the years. Many years ago I was introduced to fried ice cream there. I always get the cheese enchildalis. You can't go wrong eating here.

data.title: Great mexican food
data.text: I am so in love with this place!!! I had the beef puffy tacos and they were the bomb!!!! The chips and salsa were pretty good they have a red and green sauce.  The green sauce was a little too spicy to me the red sauce was served warm and i really enjoyed that. Their menu is huge so everyone should find something that they like. There were 6 in our group and 4 of us got the beef puffy tacos and fell in love with them. I like that they have big glasses for their tea and soda. I cant not wait to go back!!

data.title: Always good Tex-Mex
data.text: An old, reliable stand-by in League City for almost 30 years.  Marisol always takes such great care of us. I tried the chicken puffy  tacos tonight. My husband had the fajitas.  We were not disappointed.  Reasonable prices, lots of choices.

data.title: On point
data.text: I love Estebans! Great place, and I've  never had bad food or service that I can remember. Reasonably priced especially with the lunch specials. Their red salsa is the bomb, and the margaritas are strong but not too sugary like a lot of restaurants and bars make. One (stupid) complaint...why are the water and soda cups so freaking enormous? I don't need a gallon of water and coke crowding half the table lol
